title: "Why Can't I Focus on This?!"
subtitle: Using `debugDumpFocusTree()` to visualize your focus tree.

codeSamples.title: Call this function from a button press or in `initState` to see the current tree.
Sample Console Output
codeSamples.code:
FocusManager(2)
 │ primaryFocus: FocusNode#12345(Nav Rail Item 2)
 │
 └─FocusScopeNode#abcde(TV Scaffold Scope)
   │
   ├─FocusScopeNode#fghij(Nav Rail Scope)
   │ │   focus: FocusNode#54321(Nav Rail Item 1)
   │ │   active: true
   │ │
   │ └─FocusNode#12345(Nav Rail Item 2)   <-- ★ PRIMARY FOCUS
   │
   └─FocusScopeNode#klmno(Page Content Scope)
     │
     └─FocusNode#pqrst(Movie Poster 1)
